alert.note: Alert for Brazos; Houston; Madison; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 5:28PM CST until February 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Any additional ice accumulations will be a light glaze. * WHERE...Houston County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most ice accumulations can be expected in the northern and western portions of the county where temperatures hover near freezing. Icing will decrease significantly to the south and east, to where the southern and easternmost portions of the county is not likely to see any ice accumulation at all where temperatures remain above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
